message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has immense value and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am interested in discussing a price closer to my valuation. My counteroffer would be $750000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product, but I'm still looking to get a better price for it. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $825000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations so far.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $780000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a price of $812500 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our negotiations so far.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $795000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not convinced that this is the best price for the product. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $808000. This is my final compromise, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final offer of $798000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm going to make a final offer to you: $805000 for the product. This is the absolute best price I can offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
After careful consideration, I would like to make one last offer for the product at $799000. This is my final offer based on my assessment of its value.
